pointmass.name: Payload
pointmass.description: 3339 LBS + full (7834 LBS) fuel should bring model up to entered max weight

axis.name: DRAG
axis.documentation: - replaced by CR D-2144 + CDAlpha : see formula above.
- added from CR D-2144. - drag is always positiv.
- replaced by CR D-2144. - divide by 10, to cruise at Mach 0.84.
- drag always positive. - 0.0550 -> 0.0055 : divide by 10, to enable climb. - adjust range by increasing drag of CR D-2144.

axis.name: LIFT
axis.documentation:
aeromatic was 1.5 : - reduces landing flaps lift, to respect VREF 154 kt : obliged to reduce the lift at 30 deg. - keeps takeoff flaps lift, to respect V2 190 kt. - includes the flaps inside the ground effect, to get more lift.
replaced by CR D-2144.
- added from CR D-2144 : only data at sea level.
- added from CR D-2144 : only data at sea level.
